trans-unit.target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000010_SOULEATER<tab>My feast...must not end... My feast...must not be interrupted!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000015_SOULEATER<tab>My feast...must not end... My feast...must not be interrupted!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000020_PANDAEMONIUM<tab>I am...Pandæmonium.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000030_PANDAEMONIUM<tab>From countless failures have I wrought miracles. Into soulless vessels, I breathe life!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000040_THEMIS<tab>I suppose I have Athena to thank for this incarnation. I have long considered how I might stand against you, I admit.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000050_THEMIS<tab>In transformation I present to you my truth. I am Elidibus!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000060_ATHENA<tab>You have done well to reach the seat of godhood. Now, bare your souls to me!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000070_THEMIS<tab>...I see. Then Hephaistos's story has been laid bare.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000080_THEMIS<tab>As has the nature of our mysterious crystal. The questions which led us into Pandæmonium are answered, and soon order shall be restored.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000090_THEMIS<tab>I, too, can fade away, unburdened by regret. I could not have reached this point without you, friend.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000100_THEMIS<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000110_THEMIS<tab>So many revelations, but there are more, if you would dig a little deeper.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000120_THEMIS<tab>Elidibus's soul was plucked from the aetherial sea, and from it I was wrought. Surely you have a passing interest in what I remember. In what I feel...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000130_THEMIS<tab>You deserve what answers I can provide. While my memories of Pandæmonium are clear, all else is...hazy at best.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000140_THEMIS<tab>Perhaps Athena made me this way, or...perhaps it is the result of who or what I was before.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000150_THEMIS<tab>Still, I can recall vague figures. Scenes from my future, and your past...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000160_THEMIS<tab>At the Crystal Tower's peak we clash. And later, from that selfsame spire, I send you forth...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000170_THEMIS<tab>Into our age. Into Elpis.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000180_THEMIS<tab>Why do I decide on such a course? Formless as these images are, I cannot say...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000190_THEMIS<tab>...However, I can hazard a guess.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000200_THEMIS<tab>Somewhere within my fragmented memories, I catch a glimpse of our journey into Pandæmonium.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000210_THEMIS<tab>A glimpse which shows not the path we took or the destination where it led us, yet by its very presence demands that you are required in Elpis.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000220_THEMIS<tab>And even if that act is but one link in the chain of events which ends in Etheirys's salvation...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000230_THEMIS<tab>Then this all has meaning. Our time together─every moment─is worthwhile...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000235_THEMIS<tab>...and I am unburdened by regret.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000240_THEMIS<tab>That said, it is possible my motivations become something else entirely.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000250_THEMIS<tab>That you would cross this vast expanse in the hopes of being reunited with your allies...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000260_THEMIS<tab>A devotion that once would have baffled me. But after having been to the depths of that twisted prison and back, I think I can understand.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000270_THEMIS<tab>Now, I have pulled back the curtain as far as I dare.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000280_THEMIS<tab>The people of your age call this the aetherial sea─a name I quite enjoy. For it teems with life, each star a soul on its journey.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000290_THEMIS<tab>And among these uncountable stars, it was yours that crossed my path. For that I shall be forever grateful.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000300_THEMIS<tab>I wish you well on your journey. A journey as long as your star is bright─a journey not bound by the confines of this world, or any other.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000310_ELIDIBUS<tab>How fascinating, the truths that dwell at the edge of sleep.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000320_ELIDIBUS<tab>The course of history is set by its victors. It is immutable. And yet...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000330_ELIDIBUS<tab>Should this star continue upon its path...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000340_ELIDIBUS<tab>Look...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06401_000350_ELIDIBUS<tab>The light...
